title: Relocation henceforth shall be preferably on lands already earmarked in the D
clause_text: Relocation henceforth shall be preferably on lands already earmarked in the D.P. for E.W.S. / MHADA, Housing for dishoused (H.D.H.) or High Density Housing (H.D.H.) or Slum Improvement Zones (S.I. zone).
section: REGULATIONS RELATING TO REHABILITATION AND FREE SALE COMPONENTS â€“
